question: How to patch up a hole in drywall.
option1: Cut around the area of the hole into a square, then measure the square and cut another piece of drywall to size. Hold the new piece in place and drill to the studs. Place joint tape around the edges, then use a joint knife to apply putty. Sand it down when it's dry and wipe clean with a wet washcloth.
option2: Cut around the area of the hole into a square, then measure the square and cut another piece of drywall to size. Hold the new piece in place and scotch tape it to the studs. Place joint tape around the edges, then use a joint knife to apply putty. Sand it down when it's dry and wipe clean with a wet washcloth.

question: how to make stuffed figs
option1: Use a paring knife to cut a pocket in the side of about 24 dried figs. Tuck a small thin strip of orange zest, a blanched almond and a small piece of bittersweet chocolate into each pocket. Dip the bottoms of the figs in 4 ounces melted bittersweet chocolate and chill on a parchment-lined baking sheet until set.
option2: Use a paring knife to cut a pocket in the side of about 24 dried figs. Tuck a small thin strip of orange zest, a blanched almond and a small piece of bittersweet chocolate into each pocket. Dip the bottoms of the figs in 4 ounces melted bittersweet chocolate and heated sizzle platter on a parchment-lined baking sheet until set.

question: How to fold a t-shirt.
option1: Hold t-shirt by the shoulders so that it is facing you. Pinch it between your thumb and forefinger. Fold back sleeves so with the three excess fingers. Place face down on a flat surface. Grab the collar and fold back so that it is touching the hem.
option2: Hold t-shirt by the shoulders so that it is facing away from you. Pinch it between your thumb and forefinger. Fold back sleeves so with the three excess fingers. Place face down on a flat surface. Grab the collar and fold back so that it is touching the hem.

question: Paint a design on a glass or cup.
option1: Use acrylic glass paint for the most durable result. Unless it specifically instructs you to, you won't need to cure it after painting, just let it dry as you would a canvas. The paint will last a long time but don't use a scrub brush on it or the paint may begin to wear off.

question: How can I make a smore inside?
option1: Break your graham crackers in half and lay out on the counter. For every two crackers, break off two squares of chocolate bar and lay on the cracker, Put a marshmallow on a fork and roast gently over the flame of a gas range. Put the hot, roasted marshmallow on one cracker, cover with a piece of chocolate and another cracker. Cool a little and enjoy
option2: Break your graham crackers in half and lay out on the counter. For every two crackers, break off two squares of chocolate bar and lay on the cracker, Put a marshmallow on a fork and roast gently over the flame of a gas range. Put the hot, roasted marshmallow on one cracker, cover with a bit of chocolate milk and cover with a wet cracker. Cool a little and enjoy!
